ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 36
ygData.msgSnippet: Where are these posts from? And The rumor I ve heard is Ardane (aradune or whatever his name is) is a GM, is this correct or not? ... From: Joel Thronburg
ygData.messageBody:
Where are these posts from? And The rumor I've heard is Ardane (aradune or
whatever his name is) is a GM, is this correct or not?

-----Original Message-----
From: Joel Thronburg [mailto:jthronburg@...]
Sent: Monday, June 28, 1999 3:37 PM
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 36


From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>

Yeah lets look at the things he has said regarding the stuff he
carries....

Flaming sword - "No groups currently active have enough firepower to get
the Avenger"

Green Splinted Plate - "It would require several groups of 50 level
characters ready to die to get one piece"

Yet all the things he wears are "attainable".......If you have a bunch
of powergamer types all at level 50 that don't mind you taking all the
loot to get the gear.


> -----Original Message-----
> From: CAB [SMTP:Bash@...]
> Sent: Monday, June 28, 1999 3:34 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 36
>
> From: CAB <Bash@...>
>
> so what's the excuse on rangers or shadowknights who also get the exp.
> penalty? SK pets? yeah right ask most SK's how handy there pets are,
> and
> what about rangers? and aradune does still use this weapon, and he is
> still a ranger, and he said all of he EQ was getable by his char in
> his
> post about his part in killing lady Vox.
>
> Grailyn
